TopicTitle: How to do a "flash bulb" effect?

Articles.Content:
I'm currently working on an Orion-drive rocket mod

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/28428-Orion-aka-Ol-Boom-boom

It propels itself by detonating a series of atom bombs behind a pusher plate.

I was wondering if there was a way to create an effect of a momentary flash of light, to briefly illuminate the ship (or things around it) in synch with the detonations?
Never mind. I figured out how to do it in a plugin .dll
